original: kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste /
analyzed: kye rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste /
translated: “O child of noble family, this will take you far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: This will not bring you closer to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'du ba ste /
analyzed: 'thab mo dang / 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'du ba ste /
translated: Quarrels, disputes, arguments, and recriminations

original: 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te /🔽de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te / de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo //
translated: are not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽This is the path to the hells.

original: de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
analyzed: de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
translated: This is the path to the animal realm.

original: de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo //
analyzed: de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo //
translated: This is the path to the world of Yama.

original: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na /
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, when individuals who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas quarrel, dispute, argue, and recriminate with other individuals who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas,

original: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Then the evil Māra thinks,

original: 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
translated: ‘These two are far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
translated: These two will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin /🔽rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems @36a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin / rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems @36a * //
translated: The path that these two sons of good family have undertaken is not the path to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam la brtsams so zhes nas /
analyzed: can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam la brtsams so zhes nas /
translated: These two sons of good family have undertaken the path to the hells, the animal world, and the world of Yama.’

original: dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' zhing spro ba dang / tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is delighted, elated, satisfied, and happy.

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang gal te /
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda,

original: byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pas /
translated: if a bodhisattva who has not been predicted

original: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing 'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na /
translated: If bodhisattvas think that the predictions are harmful, and they fight, quarrel, argue, and dispute,

original: gal te de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong zhe na /
translated: if they do not give up the knowledge of all aspects,

original: ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: they should don the armor for as many eons as there are thoughts of nonvirtue that have arisen, and as many thoughts of fighting, quarreling, arguing, and disputing that have arisen.

original: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: Ānanda said,

original: bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
translated: “Blessed One, are there other thoughts that arise for them?

original: 'on te ma lags kyi bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo bar 'tshal /
analyzed: 'on te ma lags kyi bskal pa de snyed kho nar go cha bgo bar 'tshal /
translated: Or do they have to don the armor for as many eons as those thoughts?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Ānanda, they have to don the armor for as many eons as those thoughts.”

original: kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
translated: Ānanda, I teach the Dharma to persons in the vehicle of the hearers, in the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas, and in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, together with the emergence.

original: kun dga' bo de gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg par byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan par brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod par byas nas phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin 'khon du bzung ste gnas na kun dga' bo gang zag de ni nges par 'byung bar mi smra ste /
analyzed: kun dga' bo de gang zag de byang chub sems dpa'i theg par byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan par brjod pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod par byas nas phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin 'khon du bzung ste gnas na kun dga' bo gang zag de ni nges par 'byung bar mi smra ste /
translated: Ānanda, if a person in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas quarrels, disputes, and argues with a person in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, and having quarreled, disputed, and argued, does not confess his or her faults, but holds on to resentment and remains resentful, Ānanda, I do not say that such a person will emerge.

original: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na /
translated: If such a person does not give up the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
translated: he or she will have to don the armor for that many eons.

original: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
analyzed: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thab cing rtsod de gshe ba dang / mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur na yang mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa 'dzin cing bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
translated: Ananda, if a bodhisattva-mahasattva, in the midst of disputes, arguments, anger, and harsh words, does not hold grudges, but in the future maintains restraint, thinking, “I should not have obtained what I obtained,🔽since I should have removed the suffering of all sentient beings, it is not right for me to respond in kind to those who speak unpleasantly to me.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na de ltar bdag @36b gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na de ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na de ltar bdag @36b gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir bzlog pa ni mi tshul gyis bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o //
translated: Since I should have become a bridge for all sentient beings, it is not right for me to speak unpleasantly to others and turn them away.

original: bdag gis glen pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis glen pa dang lkugs pa bzhin du bya'o //
translated: I should be like a fool or a mute.

original: bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o //
translated: I should not let my thoughts be disturbed.

original: sems can de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ste /
translated: I will fully awaken to supreme and perfect buddhahood and liberate those beings from cyclic existence.🔽

original: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na /
translated: I must fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and lead those sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa.

original: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis /
analyzed: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang / de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyis /
translated: If I have ill will toward them, if I quarrel with them, that is not the right way.

original: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
translated: I must not have ill will toward them.

original: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na /
analyzed: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na /
translated: I must not quarrel with them.’

original: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges par 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
analyzed: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nges par 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
translated: Ānanda, I explain that bodhisattva great beings have a way out,

original: de la bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
analyzed: de la bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
translated: and Māra the wicked one, looking for an opportunity, looking for a chance, does not get an opportunity.

original: kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o //
analyzed: kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Ānanda, bodhisattva great beings should not associate with persons in the Śrāvaka Vehicle.

original: de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not live with them.

original: 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not sit with them.

original: gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya /
analyzed: gal te 'dug na yang des su la yang gnod sems su mi bya /
translated: If one does sit with them, one should not be angry with them.

original: 'khrug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'khrug par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not quarrel with them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
analyzed: gang bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang / 'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
translated: “It is not right for me to be angry with them or to quarrel with them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
translated: Because I should fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for them,

original: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o //
translated: and I should free them from all suffering.’

original: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
analyzed: kun dga' bos gsol pa /
translated: ” Ānanda said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, how should bodhisattva great beings live with those who are in the Bodhisattva Vehicle?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Ānanda, it is like this:

original: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the Teacher and the disciples are to be regarded,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
translated: so a bodhisattva great being should regard a person in the bodhisattva vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: This is my companion, my fellow traveler.

original: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
translated: Just as he should train, so should I.

original: 'dis sbyin @37a * //🔽pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'dis sbyin @37a * // pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
translated: He is practicing the perfection of giving,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
translated: up to the perfection of wisdom, up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: And the Sūtra on Generating the Power of Faith also says,

original: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rang rgyal ba rnams la /
analyzed: 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rang rgyal ba rnams la /
translated: Mañjuśrī, suppose a son or daughter of good family were to abuse, revile, speak badly to, and disturb as many solitary buddhas as there are atoms in the river Ganges,

original: bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshe bar byed /🔽mi snyan par brjod /
analyzed: bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshe bar byed / mi snyan par brjod /
translated: for aeons as numerous as the sands of the river Ganges.

original: rnyog par byed la /
analyzed: rnyog par byed la /
translated: But suppose another person were to see someone else who had committed all those evil deeds, and out of compassion were to think,🔽“I must free this person from all evil deeds.”

original: 'gran par byed /
analyzed: 'gran par byed /
translated: They compete with each other.

original: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yud tsam zhig kyang gshe bar byed /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yud tsam zhig kyang gshe bar byed /
translated: “Son of noble family, if another son or daughter of noble family were to revile a bodhisattva who has faith in the Great Vehicle for just a moment,

original: mi snyan par brjod /
analyzed: mi snyan par brjod /
translated: speak unpleasantly to them,

original: rnyog par byed na /
analyzed: rnyog par byed na /
translated: or cause them to be defamed,

original: 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa ches grangs med par skyed par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa ches grangs med par skyed par byed de /
translated: that would create incalculably more negativity than that.

original: 'di'i tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i tshad ni brjod par sla ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not easy to describe the extent of that.

original: 'jam dpal gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad zla ba gcig dang nyi ma gcig par gyur cing /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad zla ba gcig dang nyi ma gcig par gyur cing /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if all the worlds were to become one moon and one sun,

original: de dag kyang rang rgyal bas yongs su gang bar gyur la /
analyzed: de dag kyang rang rgyal bas yongs su gang bar gyur la /
translated: and those were filled with solitary buddhas,

original: rang rgyal ba re re la yang sbyin bdag lha'i gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad la sogs pa'i sbyin bdag chen po gzhal du med cing grangs med par gyur to //
analyzed: rang rgyal ba re re la yang sbyin bdag lha'i gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad la sogs pa'i sbyin bdag chen po gzhal du med cing grangs med par gyur to //
translated: and each solitary buddha had countless and limitless benefactors of divine clothes, food, bedding, seats, medicine at times of illness, and other necessities,

original: rang rgyal ba de dag gi sbyin bdag de dag thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba gyur la /
analyzed: rang rgyal ba de dag gi sbyin bdag de dag thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs par gyur pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba gyur la /
translated: All those who were patrons of those pratyekabuddhas became stream-enterers, once-returners, and non-returners.

original: de nas gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de nas gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: Then, some with malicious minds

original: drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bas /
analyzed: drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bas /
translated: and violent thoughts

original: rang rgyal ba de dag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba de dag gi bdog pa thams cad 'phrog par byed /
analyzed: rang rgyal ba de dag dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba de dag gi bdog pa thams cad 'phrog par byed /
translated: came and robbed those pratyekabuddhas and the stream-enterers, once-returners, and non-returners of all their possessions.

original: yo byad thams cad rgyun gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yo byad thams cad rgyun gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to cut off all their resources,

original: nyi ma dang zla ba snub par byed la /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba snub par byed la /
translated: they eclipsed the sun and moon.

original: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khros par gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khros par gyur te /
translated: “But, son of noble family, if some other son of noble family or daughter of noble family were to get angry at a bodhisattva who has faith in the Great Vehicle,

original: zas gcod par byed /
analyzed: zas gcod par byed /
translated: and were to deprive them of food,

original: zas gcod du 'jug par byed /
analyzed: zas gcod du 'jug par byed /
translated: and make them stop eating,

original: yo byad thams cad rgyun du gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yo byad thams cad rgyun du gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and in order to cut off all their resources,

original: de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra na /
analyzed: de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra na /
translated: If someone were to speak uncomplimentarily about them,

original: 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do //
analyzed: 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do //
translated: that person would generate incalculably more negativity than that.

original: 'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba dang / brgya byin gyi bde @37b ba dang ldan par gyur cing /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba dang / brgya byin gyi bde @37b ba dang ldan par gyur cing /
translated: Mañjuśrī, if all sentient beings were to possess the bliss of a universal monarch and the bliss of Śakra,

original: de nas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis /
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis /
translated: and then some son or daughter of good family

translated: I should provide him with all the necessities that are suitable for him.”🔽Kāśyapa, the monk official should think of him as a very dear person.

analyzed: lhogs shig / kha ton gyis shig / kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis /

analyzed: khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur /

analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur bar gyis shig //
translated: the more you will beautify the community of monks.

analyzed: 'dul ba brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig / bdag nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Beautify it with the recitation of the monastic code, and let your own wisdom be supreme.

original: 'od srungs de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par btang bar mi bya /
analyzed: 'od srungs de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par btang bar mi bya /

original: bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsrung bar bya'o //

analyzed: 'od srungs de la chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed bas las su bsgo bar mi bya'o //
translated: Kāśyapa, the monk in charge should not assign work to those monks who are expounders of Dharma.

analyzed: grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la chos 'chad du gzhug go //
translated: He should cause them to enter the villages, towns, cities, countries, and royal palaces, and to teach the Dharma.

original: chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: He should order those who listen to the Dharma.

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o //
translated: He should purify the circle of the assembly.

analyzed: 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: He should cause them to enter the maṇḍala for the sake of the Dharma talk.

analyzed: chos smra ba'i dge slong la dge slong gang dag gnod par byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o //
translated: The monk who is the rector should ward off those monks who are harmful to the monk who is teaching the Dharma.

original: dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya /
analyzed: dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya /
translated: The monk who is the rector should always welcome the monk who is teaching the Dharma.

original: legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o //
analyzed: legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o //

translated: Because they are not satisfied with their own gains.🔽Kāśyapa, if any monk in charge of affairs

original: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi 'am /🔽phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am /
analyzed: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi 'am / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am /
translated: were to steal from the Saṅgha,🔽from the Saṅgha of the four directions,

original: mchod rten gyi 'tshol bar byas na /
analyzed: mchod rten gyi 'tshol bar byas na /
translated: or from a stūpa,

original: de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
translated: I would say that the ripening of that would be such that I could not describe it even if I were to speak for an eon.🔽Kāśyapa, if any monk in charge of affairs,

original: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas /
analyzed: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas /
translated: having heard these dangers,

original: khro ba 'am /🔽gshe ba 'am /
analyzed: khro ba 'am / gshe ba 'am /
translated: were to be angry,

original: gnod par sems shing /
analyzed: gnod par sems shing /
translated: malicious,

original: khong khro ba skyed na /
analyzed: khong khro ba skyed na /
translated: and give rise to hostility,

original: de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do //
analyzed: de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do //
translated: I would say that he is incurable.

original: 'od srungs de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos nas /
analyzed: 'od srungs de lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos nas /
translated: Kāśyapa, therefore, having heard such a true teaching,

original: dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par bya'o //
translated: a monk in charge of affairs should purify his body, speech, and mind.

original: bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: He should protect himself and others.

original: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang @48a * //
analyzed: 'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang @48a * //
translated: Kāśyapa, a monk who is an administrator🔽

original: gi sha la za yang bla'i /
analyzed: gi sha la za yang bla'i /
translated: Kāśyapa, it is better for a monk who is in charge of the community’s business to eat his own flesh🔽than to consume the alms-bowl

original: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam /
translated: of the Three Jewels,

original: chos gos sam /
analyzed: chos gos sam /
translated: or the robes,

original: na ba'i gsos sman nam /
analyzed: na ba'i gsos sman nam /
translated: or the medicine for curing illness,

original: yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o //
translated: or the other goods that have been consecrated.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Mahākāśyapa said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhod pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnams bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhod pa rnams kyi lhod pa'i chos dang / 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyi 'dzem dog gi chos rnams bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so //
translated: “Blessed One, you have taught the lax practices of the lax and the strict practices of the strict.”

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul pa'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul pa'i mdo las kyang /
translated: And in the Sūtra on the Exhortation of Mahāmaudgalyāyana,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas /
translated: “Blessed One, if bodhisattvas abandon the highest of teachings,

original: las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing /
analyzed: las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing /
translated: Those who engage in negative actions have very little wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so //
translated: They will be deficient in wisdom.”

original: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //🔽byams pa de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // byams pa de de bzhin te /
translated: When this was said, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya,

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: “Maitreya, it is so, it is so!

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /🔽byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: Those bodhisattvas who abandon the supreme Dharma and engage in negative actions🔽will have very little wisdom.

original: shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no //🔽byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no // byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o //
translated: They will be deficient in wisdom.

original: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Maitreya, you should have conviction, you should understand this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing /
translated: Those bodhisattvas who do not apply themselves

original: bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who are without meditative concentration, without renunciation, without recitation, and without seeking to listen extensively,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no //
translated: they are not renunciants in the teachings of the Tathagata.

original: byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par gzhag pa dang / brtson pas phye ba yin gyis /
analyzed: byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang / ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang / ye shes kyis mnyam par gzhag pa dang / brtson pas phye ba yin gyis /
translated: Maitreya, the teachings of the Tathagata are distinguished by meditative concentration and renunciation, by wisdom and composition, by wisdom and equipoise, and by diligence.

original: khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: They are not distinguished by household duties and service.

original: 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la sbyor ba rnams dang / 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste /
translated: Because that service is for those engaged in what is improper, for those who delight in conditioned things, and for those who are occupied with worldly activities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dod pa bskyed @48b par mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dod pa bskyed @48b par mi bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should not develop desire for that.

original: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
analyzed: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
translated: Maitreya, if a bodhisattva who is diligent in service

original: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis /
analyzed: rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis /
translated: If this trichiliocosm were filled with stūpas made of the seven precious substances,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin /🔽ri mor byas pa ma yin /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin / ri mor byas pa ma yin /
translated: that would not please me.🔽That would not be an act of respect.

original: bkur stir byas pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bkur stir byas pa ma yin gyi /
translated: That would not be an act of worship.🔽Maitreya, if a bodhisattva were to hold just one four-line verse from the perfection of wisdom,

original: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam /
analyzed: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam /
translated: were to hold it,

original: 'chang ngam / klog gam /🔽kun chub par byed dam 'chad pa de ni nga la bkur stir byas /
analyzed: 'chang ngam / klog gam / kun chub par byed dam 'chad pa de ni nga la bkur stir byas /
translated: were to read it,

original: bla mar byas /🔽ri mor byas /
analyzed: bla mar byas / ri mor byas /
translated: were to master it, and were to explain it, that would be an act of respect to me.🔽That would be an act of veneration.

original: mchod par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchod par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: That would be an act of worship.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi /
translated: Maitreya, the enlightenment of the tathāgatas arises from much listening.

original: dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It does not arise from the acquisition of things.

original: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
analyzed: byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
translated: Maitreya, if a bodhisattva who is diligent in service

original: byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas sbags par byed na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas sbags par byed na /
translated: were to cause a bodhisattva who is diligent in receiving and reciting the scriptures to be defiled by service,

original: bsod nams 'dod pa des ni /
analyzed: bsod nams 'dod pa des ni /
translated: that one who desires merit

original: bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te /
translated: would generate a great mass of demerit

original: las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: and would also take up the obscuration of karma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those three bases of merit arise from wisdom.

original: byams pa de lta bas na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
analyzed: byams pa de lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas /
translated: Maitreya, therefore,🔽a bodhisattva who is diligent in service

original: byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o //
translated: should not create obstacles for a bodhisattva who is diligent in receiving and reciting the scriptures.

original: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig la /
translated: All the administrators in the world are filled with the administrators who are bodhisattvas.

original: rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: All of them should be served and honored by one who is diligent in receiving and reciting the scriptures.

original: bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang //
analyzed: bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang //
translated: And in the Sūtra on the Aspects of the Truths,🔽it says,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i zhal ta gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i zhal ta gang zhe na /
translated: “What is a bodhisattva’s service?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang / chos nyan pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la snyom las med pa dang / ltos pa med pas zhal ta byed pa'i bya ba la bya'o //🔽sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' @49a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang / chos nyan pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon rnams la snyom las med pa dang / ltos pa med pas zhal ta byed pa'i bya ba la bya'o // sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' @49a * //
translated: It is service to the stūpas of the Tathāgatas, to those who are listening to the Dharma, and to preceptors and teachers, without laziness and without regard to material things.🔽Śāriputra,

original: gang la las tha na legs so zhes bya ba yang re bas zhal ta de mi bya /
analyzed: gang la las tha na legs so zhes bya ba yang re bas zhal ta de mi bya /
translated: a bodhisattva should not serve others with the hope of getting something in return, not even a word of thanks.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bos zhal ta mi bya ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bos zhal ta mi bya ste /
translated: He should not serve others with such a motive.

original: 'di ni zhal ta shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhal ta shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: This is called knowing how to serve.”

original: yongs su 'dzin pa la dgongs pa bstan pa /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa la dgongs pa bstan pa /
translated: The explanation of the intention of the one who holds.

original: ji lta bu zhig gi mdo las kyang /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig gi mdo las kyang /
translated: In what kind of sutra?

original: mood gal gyi bus gsol pa /
analyzed: mood gal gyi bus gsol pa /
translated: Maudgalyāyana said:

original: btsun pa dge slong gang la la zhig skyes bu gang zag brgyad kyi zhing la phul ba dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun chen po'i dkor gyis dor ba dang / rgyal po'i khol po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang /
analyzed: btsun pa dge slong gang la la zhig skyes bu gang zag brgyad kyi zhing la phul ba dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun chen po'i dkor gyis dor ba dang / rgyal po'i khol po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang /
translated: “Lord, someone who has given to the fields of the eight kinds of persons, who has wasted the wealth of the great saṅgha of the four directions, who is a slave of the king, a minister of state, a royal minister,

original: blon po dang / smad 'tshong ma mchog dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mo dam pa la brten nas /
analyzed: blon po dang / smad 'tshong ma mchog dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mo dam pa la brten nas /
translated: a prostitute, a king, or a queen,

original: bsod nams brgya phrag stong la dbang byed pa dang 'dra ba'i las gsar pa rtsom pa chen pos byed pa dang / thabs log pa de nyid kyis phyis ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba des /
analyzed: bsod nams brgya phrag stong la dbang byed pa dang 'dra ba'i las gsar pa rtsom pa chen pos byed pa dang / thabs log pa de nyid kyis phyis ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba des /
translated: and who has newly begun great actions that are like having power over hundreds of thousands of merits, and who by that very wrong means later falls—

original: bsod nams ma yin pa ci 'dra ba zhig bskyed par bgyi /
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa ci 'dra ba zhig bskyed par bgyi /
translated: what kind of demerit does he create?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said:

original: dge sbyong dor ba /
analyzed: dge sbyong dor ba /
translated: “Mendicant, you have wasted.

original: gdug pa la brten pa srid pa'i khol po //
analyzed: gdug pa la brten pa srid pa'i khol po //
translated: He is a slave to existence, which is based on the poison of anger.

original: 'khor brgyas par byed pa /
analyzed: 'khor brgyas par byed pa /
translated: He is surrounded by a retinue of a hundred.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas sbags pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas sbags pa /
translated: He is smeared with the stains of the afflictions and the secondary afflictions.

original: slob dpon ltar snang bas dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: slob dpon ltar snang bas dbang bskur ba /
translated: He is consecrated by false masters.

original: byis pa mchil snabs 'phyag cing kha 'phro za ba rnams kyis bskor ba de ni /
analyzed: byis pa mchil snabs 'phyag cing kha 'phro za ba rnams kyis bskor ba de ni /
translated: He is surrounded by childish people who wipe their noses and eat leftovers.

original: rma bya'i 'bag lta bus srin bu'i ras kha bsgyur ba'i gos dang / rams kyis kha bsgyur ba'i sha 'gag dang / bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i lham gyon nas /
analyzed: rma bya'i 'bag lta bus srin bu'i ras kha bsgyur ba'i gos dang / rams kyis kha bsgyur ba'i sha 'gag dang / bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i lham gyon nas /
translated: He wears a peacock mask, clothes dyed with the silk of worms, a meat-loaf dyed with lac, and shoes that are colorful and bright.

original: bal mchog gi 'bol stan la gnas gnas te /
analyzed: bal mchog gi 'bol stan la gnas gnas te /
translated: He sits on a cushion of the finest wool.

original: dge slong des pa la smod cing 'dri /
analyzed: dge slong des pa la smod cing 'dri /
translated: He criticizes and insults the monk Sūrata.

original: gshe ba dang / spyo ba dang sdigs mdzub dag gis gnas nas 'byin par byed /
analyzed: gshe ba dang / spyo ba dang sdigs mdzub dag gis gnas nas 'byin par byed /
translated: He expels him from his dwelling with abuse, threats, and taunting.

original: de dag la sngon du 'ong ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las 'dud pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo zhing /
analyzed: de dag la sngon du 'ong ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las 'dud pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo zhing /
translated: He orders him around, saying, “Come here! Go there! Get up! Put your hands together! Bow down!”

original: chu mchog dang zas mchog dang / mal stan mchog yongs su longs spyod pas /
analyzed: chu mchog dang zas mchog dang / mal stan mchog yongs su longs spyod pas /
translated: By enjoying the best of water, the best of food, and the best of bedding,

original: mtshams med pa dang nye bar 'dra ba'i sdig pa ches shin tu sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshams med pa dang nye bar 'dra ba'i sdig pa ches shin tu sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will commit a sin that is similar to the heinous crimes.🔽Just as those who desire purity avoid the feces and urine of others,

original: ji ltar gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis bdag gi lus dang / gos brlag par ma gyur cig snyam nas /
analyzed: ji ltar gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis bdag gi lus dang / gos brlag par ma gyur cig snyam nas /
translated: thinking, “May my body and clothes not be defiled,”

original: bshang gci ring du spong bar byed la /
analyzed: bshang gci ring du spong bar byed la /
translated: and throw them far away,

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sras po zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sras po zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /
translated: in the same way, the Buddha’s sons who desire the purity of untainted morality

original: de lta bu'i gang zag mthong @49b nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i gang zag mthong @49b nas /
translated: will avoid such people

original: lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi longs spyod gnyis las ring du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi longs spyod gnyis las ring du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and stay far away from the enjoyment of the Dharma of transmission and realization.

original: rgyud ma lta bur gyur ba rtag par mi dge ba byed pa /
analyzed: rgyud ma lta bur gyur ba rtag par mi dge ba byed pa /
translated: They are like a corpse, constantly doing nonvirtuous actions.

original: shing dang lteng ka bskams pa dang 'dra ba /
analyzed: shing dang lteng ka bskams pa dang 'dra ba /
translated: They are like a dried-up tree or a dried-up pond.

original: dam pa'i chos kyi ljon shing gi bcud zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims 'joms pa /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi ljon shing gi bcud zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims 'joms pa /
translated: They destroy the untainted morality that is the sap of the tree of the holy Dharma.

original: lus zangs kyi gos kyis g-yogs pa ;
analyzed: lus zangs kyi gos kyis g-yogs pa ;
translated: His body is covered with copper.

original: lcags kyi gong bu 'bar ba za ba /
analyzed: lcags kyi gong bu 'bar ba za ba /
translated: He eats burning iron balls.

original: bdag nyid kyi khrag khol ma 'thung ba /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi khrag khol ma 'thung ba /
translated: He drinks his own boiling blood.

original: mi ma rabs lo ma rul ba lta bu sgra snyan pa nyams pa'i dung gi skad ltar kun du spyod pa /
analyzed: mi ma rabs lo ma rul ba lta bu sgra snyan pa nyams pa'i dung gi skad ltar kun du spyod pa /
translated: He is like a rotten leaf, like the sound of a conch whose pitch has deteriorated.

original: bdag dang gzhan rnam par 'joms pa ni /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan rnam par 'joms pa ni /
translated: He is a destroyer of self and others.

original: mthar gnas ltar rnal 'byor pas yongs su spong bar byed do //
analyzed: mthar gnas ltar rnal 'byor pas yongs su spong bar byed do //
translated: The yogi should completely abandon him, like one would a snake.

original: mood gal gyi bus gsol pa /
analyzed: mood gal gyi bus gsol pa /
translated: Maudgalyāyana said,

original: bcom ldan 'das des bskal pa brgyad cur mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des bskal pa brgyad cur mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar bya dgos so //
translated: “Blessed One, he must experience the suffering of Avīci Hell for eighty eons.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: mood gal gyi bu de de bzhin te /
analyzed: mood gal gyi bu de de bzhin te /
translated: “Maudgalyāyana, that is so.

original: bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cur bsdams pa bskal pa chen po der dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrogs pa des der sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cur bsdams pa bskal pa chen po der dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrogs pa des der sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For eighty intermediate eons, he will experience suffering there, because he obstructed the door of the saṅgha’s assembly for that great eon.

original: las kyi zas can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: las kyi zas can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: He will have karmic food.

original: de'i lus bcu 'gyur dang / de gzhon sha chags pas mar sar dang ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu dang / tshor ba bcu 'gyur du rnam par chad pa med par gnad thams cad gcod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //🔽las byas shing bsags pa de zhig cing bsal ba nyams par gyur pa /
analyzed: de'i lus bcu 'gyur dang / de gzhon sha chags pas mar sar dang ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu dang / tshor ba bcu 'gyur du rnam par chad pa med par gnad thams cad gcod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro // las byas shing bsags pa de zhig cing bsal ba nyams par gyur pa /
translated: The body is ten times worse, like a lump of butter or cotton wool, and the feelings are ten times worse, with the suffering of all the vital organs being cut at once.

original: yongs su zad par gyur gyi bar du kun nas 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba /
analyzed: yongs su zad par gyur gyi bar du kun nas 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba /
translated: The karma that has been done and accumulated will not disappear or be reduced until it has been destroyed.🔽It will burn, blaze,

original: yang dag par rab tu 'bar ba /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu 'bar ba /
translated: and be fully ablaze,

original: rgya skyegs kyi kha dog lta bur 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'tshed do //
analyzed: rgya skyegs kyi kha dog lta bur 'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'tshed do //
translated: like the color of lac.

original: de nas shi 'phos te sdig pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos te sdig pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus /
translated: Then, after death, due to the concordant effect of the latent tendencies of evil,

original: gung dang / byi la dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki'i mngal du sdig to can 'tshed par skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gung dang / byi la dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki'i mngal du sdig to can 'tshed par skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the evildoer will be born in the womb of a monkey, a cat, a lion, a tiger, or a wolf.

original: der yang sngar sdig pa spyod cing des mun pa nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: der yang sngar sdig pa spyod cing des mun pa nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: And it is said that they will go from darkness into darkness, having previously engaged in evil deeds.

original: nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /
analyzed: nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /
translated: The Sūtra on the Essence of the Sun also says:

original: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /🔽nga'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam /
analyzed: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na / nga'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam /
translated: In the present and future times,🔽whatever Dharma or

original: dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par /
translated: semblance of the true Dharma remains of my teaching,🔽whatever Dharma-abiding monks have been offered by anyone,🔽whether a monastery, a park, a field, a male or female slave,

original: chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang kun dga' ra ba dang / zhing dang bran dang / bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos @50a * //🔽pa de la /
analyzed: chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang kun dga' ra ba dang / zhing dang bran dang / bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos @50a * // pa de la /
translated: to those who are Dharma-abiding monks🔽and to those who are not Dharma-abiding monks,

original: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na /
analyzed: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na /
translated: if evil monks who are immoral use even a single leaf, a single fruit, or a single flower,

original: de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: that will be to the detriment and harm of those fools.

original: de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Four kinds of harm will arise for them.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen por 'gro ba yin /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen por 'gro ba yin /
translated: They are: (1) going to a place of great disrepute;

original: mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / rim gro pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / rim gro pa dang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: (2) quickly being separated from those who are dear, those who are friends, relatives, blood relatives, preceptors, teachers, attendants, and those who are loved and pleasing;

original: nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: (3) being afflicted with long-lasting, serious illnesses;

original: de'i chos gos dang / lhung bzed gang yod pa de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i chos gos dang / lhung bzed gang yod pa de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: and (4) having whatever Dharma robes and alms bowls they have stolen by the five great fears.

original: lnga gang dag gis she na /
analyzed: lnga gang dag gis she na /
translated: What are the five?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so //
analyzed: rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa'i mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so //
translated: the king, thieves, fire, water, and unloved heirs.

original: de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: They quickly accomplish the four results that are not desired in the next world.

original: bzhi gang dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang dag yin zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin te /🔽gal te brgyal res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas /
analyzed: lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin te / gal te brgyal res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas /
translated: When their bodies disintegrate, they will be born in the great, unbearable hell realms.

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas shi 'phos nas /🔽'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas shi 'phos nas / 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du /
translated: If, after a long time, they should die and transmigrate from that great hell realm,🔽they will be born in a remote, dry wilderness

original: dud 'gro dang / yi dags kyi rigs su long ba dang / rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dud 'gro dang / yi dags kyi rigs su long ba dang / rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: among animals and hungry ghosts, blind and without arms or legs.

original: de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin /🔽gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas /
analyzed: de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin / gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas /
translated: For many hundreds of thousands of years, they will experience the suffering of being tormented by hunger and thirst.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas /🔽lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas / lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sbrul gdug pa /
translated: If, after a long time, they should die and transmigrate from there,🔽they will be born among poisonous snakes

original: long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: that eat dust and are blind.

original: de brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas /
analyzed: de brgyal res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas /
translated: If, after a long time, they should die and transmigrate from there,

original: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
analyzed: gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na /
translated: If they are born among humans,

original: 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu /
analyzed: 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu /
translated: they will be born in buddha-fields with the five degenerations,

original: mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: and they will obtain a human body.

original: mong rtul ba dang tshul 'di mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / mig ma tshang ba dang / lag pa ma tshang ba dang / rkang pa ma tshang ba dang / khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha @50b zas la gdu zhing /🔽rkyag khung pa'i kha zas la za ba dang / 'dam rdza ba dang / phyag dar khrod na gnas pa dang / 'brog dgon pa dang / lam po che rnams na 'tsho bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: mong rtul ba dang tshul 'di mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / mig ma tshang ba dang / lag pa ma tshang ba dang / rkang pa ma tshang ba dang / khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha @50b zas la gdu zhing / rkyag khung pa'i kha zas la za ba dang / 'dam rdza ba dang / phyag dar khrod na gnas pa dang / 'brog dgon pa dang / lam po che rnams na 'tsho bar 'gyur la /
translated: They will be stupid and ignorant of this method, and they will be born blind, or without hands, or without feet, or with a body that is covered with sores, or with a body that is covered with leprosy, or with a body that is covered with abscesses, or with a body that is covered with scabs, or with a body that is covered with eczema, or with a body that is covered with white spots, or with a body that is covered with a rash, or with a body that is covered with boils, or with a body that is covered with pustules, or with a body that is covered with ulcers, or with a body that is covered with tumors, or with a body that is covered with warts, or with a body that is covered with blisters, or with a body that is covered with leprosy, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and sores, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and abscesses, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and scabs, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and eczema, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and white spots, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and rashes, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and boils, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and pustules, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and ulcers, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and tumors, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and warts, or with a body that is covered with leprosy and blisters.

original: de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin te /🔽de ltar lci bar 'byung zhe na /
analyzed: de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin te /🔽de ltar lci bar 'byung zhe na /
translated: They will live in a place where they eat the food of dogs, or the food of pigs, or the food of donkeys, or the food of camels, or the food of cows, or the food of goats, or the food of sheep, or the food of birds, or the food of insects, or the food of worms, or the food of fish, or the food of snakes, or the food of mice, or the food of humans, or the food of demons, or the food of ghosts, or the food of spirits, or the food of goblins, or the food of piśācas, or the food of rākṣasas, or the food of kumbhāṇḍas, or the food of pūtanas, or the food of kaṭap

original: 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni /
translated: In this way, that monk who engages in negative actions

original: 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bran dang bran mo dang / phyugs dag gi bar dag phrogs nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bran dang bran mo dang / phyugs dag gi bar dag phrogs nas /
translated: will seize the homes, fields, parks, male and female servants, and cattle of those who abide by the Dharma

original: gang zag rang gi yongs su spyod pa la longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang zag rang gi yongs su spyod pa la longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: and enjoy them himself.

original: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni /
analyzed: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni /
translated: That monk who engages in negative actions🔽will strive to make all the marvelous teachings of the buddhas disappear,

original: de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang / rnam par gzhig pa dang / rgyun gcad pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang / rnam par gzhig pa dang / rgyun gcad pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no //
translated: to destroy and interrupt the Dharma way, and to cause it to vanish.

original: de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas /
translated: In the same way, he will strive to make the lineage of the Three Jewels disappear,

original: nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no //
analyzed: nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson pa yin no //
translated: and to cause it to vanish.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: Because the side of virtue is associated with accumulation,

original: chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te /
translated: The Dharma way and the lineage of the Three Jewels are also distinguished by virtue.

original: de'i phyir nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, you will certainly experience the heavy fruition of the results of your own unwholesome actions.

original: de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srungs kyis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srungs kyis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the elder Gayākāśyapa, shedding tears, said this:

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob kyang bla'i /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma thob kyang bla'i /
translated: “Venerable Blessed One, it would be better not to obtain a human birth.

original: rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags so //
analyzed: rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags so //
translated: It is not right to practice wrongly for the sake of food and drink after going forth.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: ga ya 'od srungs chen po de de bzhin no //
analyzed: ga ya 'od srungs chen po de de bzhin no //
translated: “Gayākāśyapa, that is so.

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you say.

original: gong du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i /
analyzed: gong du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni bla'i /
translated: It is better to dwell in hell for as long as it takes to exhaust those previous actions.

original: 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: It is not like this for those who practice otherwise.”

original: 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid 'thob par dka' ba rnyed de /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid 'thob par dka' ba rnyed de /
translated: Some foolish people obtain human birth, which is difficult to obtain.

original: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po @51a * //
analyzed: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po @51a * //
translated: They obtain the amazing and marvelous going forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, which is difficult to obtain, and which leads to the end of all suffering and the culmination of all defilements.

original: thob nas / 'on kyang skyes bu blun po gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang / bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: thob nas / 'on kyang skyes bu blun po gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang / bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur la /
translated: They obtain the state of a fully ordained monk, but then those foolish people do not receive offerings and are separated from food and drink.🔽They give up the practice of yoga and turn to unwholesome activities.

original: mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsal nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsal nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang /
translated: They are supported by faithful people of the warrior caste, the priestly caste, the merchant caste, and the menial caste, who give them homes, fields, parks, and pleasure groves.

original: bran dang bran mo dang / rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: bran dang bran mo dang / rkang bzhi pa dag gi bar dge slong chos kyis gnas pa /
translated: “Monks who abide by the Dharma,

original: yon tan gyis phug pa dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la /
analyzed: yon tan gyis phug pa dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la /
translated: who are rich in good qualities, should enjoy the wealth that has been dedicated to them for the sake of their enjoyment and for the sake of being in accord with virtue.

original: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu 'am /
analyzed: sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu 'am /
translated: But evil monks, through the power of their extensive learning

original: khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas /
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas /
translated: or through the power of their lay supporters, steal the wealth and possessions that have been dedicated to them.

original: bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyis yongs su spyod par byed de /

analyzed: rje'u rigs sam / dmangs rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o // gal te rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa /

analyzed: nags khrod dam /

analyzed: btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu nyams pa lags so //

analyzed: mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba nas /

analyzed: ring po mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur te /

analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste / gang khyod kyi bu 'am spun nam /

analyzed: bkrabs pa 'am /

analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te /

analyzed: skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
translated: let alone make them experience pleasure and play.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang bran mo sril  bar byed cing /

analyzed: khyim  gyi gzhi 'am / @54a * // zhing gi gzhi nas /

analyzed: lug dag gi bar sril  bar byed na / nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la /

analyzed: de yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no //

analyzed: chos dang mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i don byed pa dang / de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs nas /
translated: The kṣatriyas, brahmins, vaiśyas, and śūdras who side with the sinful monks, who do not allow them to be given up,

analyzed: dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang gnod pa byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no //

analyzed: sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /

analyzed: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //

original: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na /

analyzed: bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas /

analyzed: sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar de ni lha dang mi thams cad la yang gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / log par lhung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro // rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs sam / bram ze 'am /
translated: Because they are engaged in harming all gods and humans, in bringing them what is not beneficial, in causing them to fall, and in destroying the lineage of the Three Jewels.

original: rje'u rigs sam /
analyzed: rje'u rigs sam /
translated: Great king, whether they are of the warrior class,🔽the priest class,🔽the merchant class,

analyzed: dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing /

analyzed: sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na /

analyzed: de sbyin pa ma byin du zin kyang /
translated: even if they do not give any gifts,

analyzed: de ni dam pa'i chos rjes su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta'o //
translated: He is to be regarded as the supreme upholder of the holy Dharma, because he protects the holy Dharma.

original: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas /
translated: After death, he will be reborn in the pure buddhafields,

original: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @54b rgya ba'i  bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang @54b rgya ba'i  bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: and before long he will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect and complete buddhahood.

original: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na /

analyzed: rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyed kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang / bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis /
