original: lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa yang dag par zung shig dang / de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis gnas pa yang dag par zung shig dang / de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Because of that, this way of my doctrine and the lineage of the Three Jewels will remain for a long time,🔽and it will be beneficial and bring happiness to gods and humans.”

original: lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang / yang mdo sde de nyid las /
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar dang / yang mdo sde de nyid las /
translated: Then in that very sūtra it says:

original: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu padma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu padma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the nāga king Sāgara’s son called Lotus Face said this:

original: bdag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas /
analyzed: bdag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas /
translated: “By what karma was I born into a nāga family?

original: gzugs mchog tu lham me zhing lus kyi reg pa gang cung zad ci reg kyang kun du tshig cing 'bar ba lags /
analyzed: gzugs mchog tu lham me zhing lus kyi reg pa gang cung zad ci reg kyang kun du tshig cing 'bar ba lags /
translated: Why is my form supremely radiant, and when any part of my body is touched, does it burn and blaze?

original: bdag dus thams cad du mchil lham bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags /
analyzed: bdag dus thams cad du mchil lham bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags /
translated: Why do I always walk around naked, having thrown off my shoes?

original: bdag gi pha de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste /
analyzed: bdag gi pha de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste /
translated: My father experienced the most excellent and abundant glory.

original: dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags /
analyzed: dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags /
translated: He was like a universal monarch of the four continents.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na / de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas /
translated: “Oh Aṅgulimāla, in the past, thirty-one eons ago,🔽there was a thus-gone one called Śikhin,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //🔽de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
translated: up to a blessed buddha.🔽At that time, there was a king called Avirūpa.

original: rgyal po me tog bral des kyang /
analyzed: rgyal po me tog bral des kyang /
translated: King Avirūpa

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la /
translated: offered to the thus-gone Śikhin, together with his retinue of many hundreds of thousands of hearers and bodhisattvas,

original: zla ba gsum yo byad thams cad phul nas /
analyzed: zla ba gsum yo byad thams cad phul nas /
translated: all the necessities for three months.

original: rtag tu chos mnyan te /
analyzed: rtag tu chos mnyan te /
translated: He always listened to the Dharma,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo //
translated: and made aspirations for unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so //
translated: He also built a temple for that Blessed One, complete with all the necessary articles.

original: rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
analyzed: rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
translated: King Viraka had a son named Ajitasena.

original: de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas /
analyzed: de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas /
translated: He was terrified of cyclic existence.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste /
translated: He went forth in the presence of the Blessed One.

original: pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go //
analyzed: pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go //
translated: He took care of his father’s monastery.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de nas gang @55a * //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de nas gang @55a * //
translated: Then, the Blessed One’s śrāvaka monks who were staying there,

original: dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do //
analyzed: dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do //
translated: and those who were enjoying food, drink, and bedding, all of them Ajitasena, the monk, son of Viraka, became jealous.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo //
translated: The Blessed One’s śrāvaka monks also left that place.

original: de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyad par mi byed /
analyzed: de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyad par mi byed /
translated: He, with supreme joy, did not enjoy it himself,

original: gzhan la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: gzhan la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas /
translated: nor did he give it to others.

original: dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
analyzed: dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
translated: When that monk died,

original: sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: he was reborn among the great hells.

original: de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos so //
analyzed: de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos so //
translated: Having been reborn in the great hells for many hundreds of thousands of years, he was tormented.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas yi dags rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas yi dags rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
translated: After that, he was reborn among the pretas.

original: lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo //
analyzed: lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo //
translated: For many hundreds of thousands of years, he experienced suffering there.

original: phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dags rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo //
analyzed: phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dags rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo //
translated: Later, he again experienced suffering among the hells and pretas.

original: lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste /
analyzed: lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste /
translated: He became a monk, and his name was Sthitamati.

original: de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na gzhan yin par yang blta bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na gzhan yin par yang blta bar mi bya ste /
translated: If you think that the one who, for a long time, experienced suffering in the lower realms is someone else, you should not see it in that way.

original: de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no //
analyzed: de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no //
translated: You are the one who was seized by the tight fetters of karma.

original: 'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyes so //
analyzed: 'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyes so //
translated: From that point on, for thirty-one eons, you were always born in the three lower realms.

original: de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te /
analyzed: de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te /
translated: The remaining residue of that karma is the reason you were born among the nāgas here.

original: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo //
translated: You experienced such suffering.”

original: gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do //
analyzed: gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do //
translated: It is possible that after you die, you will be tormented by suffering among hell beings, animals, and hungry ghosts.

original: klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The nāga son, extremely unhappy, wept and bowed to the feet of the Blessed One and said,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang / myos pa  ji lta bu dang ; mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du no ngas  pa so sor 'chags lags so //
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang / myos pa  ji lta bu dang ; mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du no ngas  pa so sor 'chags lags so //
translated: “Venerable Blessed One, just like a child, just like one who is intoxicated, just like one who is unclear and unskilled, I confess my faults.

original: nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so //
analyzed: nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so //
translated: I confess my faults.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o //
translated: Venerable Blessed One, I will take up the vows according to my wish.

original: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te /
analyzed: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te /
translated: I am a lay vow holder of the Tathāgata.

original: ji srid @55b 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spang bar bgyi lags so //
analyzed: ji srid @55b 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spang bar bgyi lags so //
translated: For as long as I live, I will give up killing.

original: bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so //
analyzed: bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so //
translated: I go for refuge to the Blessed One.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rigs kyi bu legs so legs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu legs so legs so //
translated: “Excellent, son of noble family, excellent!

original: khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do //
analyzed: khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do //
translated: Since you have gone for refuge to me with an altruistic attitude, all your lower realms are exhausted.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: After you die and transmigrate from here, you will obtain a human birth during the time of Maitreya.

original: byams pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byams pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: You will go forth in the presence of Maitreya and actualize the state of an arhat.”

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na de gzhan du yin par mi blta ste /

translated: If you think that at that time, on that occasion, the king named Ketumat, who for three months served with all necessities the Buddha Śikhin and his community of monks, and for that reason made the monastery of the community perfect in all necessities, was someone else, you should not see it like that.

analyzed: de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no //

translated: The Sūtra of the Eyes of the Sky also says:

original: yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /
analyzed: yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /
translated: At that time, the lords of the gods, the lords of the nāgas, the lords of the yakṣas, the lords of the asuras, the lords of the garuḍas, the lords of the kinnaras, the lords of the mahoragas,

original: grul bum gyi dbang po dang / yi dags kyi dbang po dang / sha za'i dbang po dang / sa la rgyu ba dang nam mkha' la rgyu ba khyed rnams kyi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas yongs su gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: grul bum gyi dbang po dang / yi dags kyi dbang po dang / sha za'i dbang po dang / sa la rgyu ba dang nam mkha' la rgyu ba khyed rnams kyi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas yongs su gtad par bya'o //
translated: the lords of the kumbhāṇḍas, the lords of the pretas, the lords of the piśācas, and the lords of the terrestrial and celestial beings, I entrust this Dharma discourse to your care.

original: da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang zag don yid la byed pa /
analyzed: da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang zag don yid la byed pa /
translated: In the present and future times, individuals who keep the meaning in mind,

original: chos la gnas pa /
analyzed: chos la gnas pa /
translated: They abide by the Dharma,

original: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa /
translated: they practice the Dharma in accordance with the Dharma,

original: chos dang mthun pa'i chos spyod pa /
analyzed: chos dang mthun pa'i chos spyod pa /
translated: they act in accordance with the Dharma,

original: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / de'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / gang dag de rnams kyi yo byad 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba de dag kyang srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / de ni khyed cag la yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / de'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / gang dag de rnams kyi yo byad 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba de dag kyang srungs shig / yongs su skyongs shig / de ni khyed cag la yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: and they delight in solitude. Protect them, guard them! Protect and guard their donors and benefactors! Protect and guard those who provide them with requisites and care for them! This will bring about your long-term benefit and happiness!”

original: de nas lha'i dbang po de snyad thams cad nas /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po de snyad thams cad nas /
translated: Then the lord of the gods, having heard this,

original: sha za'i dbang po dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa la rgyu ba'i bar  thams cad kyis mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so //
analyzed: sha za'i dbang po dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa la rgyu ba'i bar  thams cad kyis mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces gsol to // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so //
translated: together with the lords of the piśācas, all those who move in the sky and on the ground, said in one voice:🔽“Venerable Blessed One, it is so!

original: btsun pa bde bar gshegs @56b pa de ltar lags so //
analyzed: btsun pa bde bar gshegs @56b pa de ltar lags so //
translated: Venerable Sugata, it is so!”

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar ba de srid du kho bo cag gis rang gi sug las dor nas de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar ba de srid du kho bo cag gis rang gi sug las dor nas de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar bgyi'o //
translated: In the future, as long as the way of the Dharma, which is blessed by the Tathāgata, blazes, we will cast aside our own work and protect the Dharma and Vinaya taught by the Tathāgata.

original: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will care for it.

original: chos pa gnas pa tshul khrims kyis phyug pa /
analyzed: chos pa gnas pa tshul khrims kyis phyug pa /
translated: For those who abide by the Dharma, who are wealthy in moral discipline,

original: yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa /
translated: who possess good qualities,

original: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /
translated: who are without possessions,

original: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba /
analyzed: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba /
translated: who delight in solitude,

original: chos kyi rjes su mthun par chos la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams chos gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su mthun par chos la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams chos gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi /
translated: and who are individuals who follow the Dharma and engage in the Dharma, we will protect them with Dharma robes, food, bedding, and medicine for the sick.

original: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will care for them.

original: nad med pa dang stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: nad med pa dang stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa nyid kyis /
translated: Through being free from illness, having strength, and abiding in the experience of bliss,

original: dge ba'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: we will accomplish that which is in accord with the side of virtue.

original: ji srid du de dag sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
analyzed: ji srid du de dag sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la yongs su rdzogs par spyod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa /
translated: As long as they are diligent in practicing the precepts established by the Buddha,

original: rab tu rnam par dben pa /
analyzed: rab tu rnam par dben pa /
translated: are completely secluded,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas shing /🔽yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / khyim dang zhing dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mchog dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas shing / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / khyim dang zhing dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mchog dang /
translated: and abide with mindfulness,🔽without being mixed up with any of the following:🔽all forms of grasping,🔽monasteries, houses, fields, male and female servants, wealth, grain, fame, gain, honor, and praise,

original: tshul 'chos dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong rnams dang thams cad du ma 'dres par gnas pa de srid du /🔽kho bo cag gis gnod sbyin gdug pa nas /
analyzed: tshul 'chos dang / kha gsag dang / gzhogs slong rnams dang thams cad du ma 'dres par gnas pa de srid du / kho bo cag gis gnod sbyin gdug pa nas /
translated: hypocrisy, flattery, and hinting,🔽we will ward off the evil yakṣas

original: lus srul po gdug pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyi'o //
analyzed: lus srul po gdug pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyi'o //
translated: and the evil pūtanas.

original: bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan pa'i bstan pa la de dag dad pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan pa'i bstan pa la de dag dad pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
translated: We will generate faith in the teachings that the Sugata has revealed.

original: ji srid du de dag zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang / lo dang dus tshigs yang dag par 'da' ba de srid du /
analyzed: ji srid du de dag zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang / lo dang dus tshigs yang dag par 'da' ba de srid du /
translated: For as long as the moon, the sun, the planets, the stars, the day, the night, the years, and the seasons pass correctly,

original: kho bo cag gis 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g-yul ngo dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang mu ge dang g-yo dang slu ba dang brdzun du smra ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char 'bab pa dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g-yul ngo dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang mu ge dang g-yo dang slu ba dang brdzun du smra ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char 'bab pa dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o //
translated: for that long we will pacify strife, quarrels, battles, disease, enemies, famine, deceit, deception, lying, untimely winds and rains.

original: bdag cag gis rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo ji snyed pa'i bar rnams mi dge ba'i chos rnams las bzlog par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo ji snyed pa'i bar rnams mi dge ba'i chos rnams las bzlog par bgyi'o //
translated: We will turn away from non-virtuous actions as many as there are of the royal class, the priestly class, the merchant class, the servant class, men, women, boys, and girls.

original: @57a * // dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: @57a * // dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: We will apply ourselves to all virtuous conduct.

original: gang zag chos la gnas pa sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams kyis spyad pa'i spyod pa la gzud par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gang zag chos la gnas pa sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par bsdams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams kyis spyad pa'i spyod pa la gzud par bgyi'o //
translated: I will cause those who abide in the Dharma to engage in the conduct of generosity, self-control, and restraint, and to possess discipline and abundant qualities.

original: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing chos kyi 'du shes kyis mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba de srid du /
analyzed: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing chos kyi 'du shes kyis mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba de srid du /
translated: For as long as the Blessed One’s hearers do not fully grasp all their hopes, and for as long as they delight in the perception of the Dharma,

original: bdag cag gis grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri sul dang yul 'khor dang ljongs de dag dang / sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ri sul dang yul 'khor dang ljongs de dag dang / sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will protect those cities, towns, mountain retreats, countries, and regions, as well as those donors and benefactors.

original: yongs su bskyang par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yongs su bskyang par bgyi'o //
translated: I will care for them.

original: nor dang / 'bru dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / nad med pa dang / phan tshun du rab tu dga' bas tshogs pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid ma tshang ba med par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: nor dang / 'bru dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / nad med pa dang / phan tshun du rab tu dga' bas tshogs pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid ma tshang ba med par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: I will ensure that they have wealth, grain, joy, play, good health, mutual affection, and a full life span.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad mi 'dzin cing /
analyzed: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad mi 'dzin cing /
translated: As long as the Blessed One’s hearers do not grasp for any hopes,

original: chos la gnas pa chos kyi rjes su mthun pas chos bsgrub par gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du 'di na yun ring por sa'i bcud dang sems can gyi gzi mdangs dang / chos kyi gzi mdangs mi nub par gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos la gnas pa chos kyi rjes su mthun pas chos bsgrub par gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du 'di na yun ring por sa'i bcud dang sems can gyi gzi mdangs dang / chos kyi gzi mdangs mi nub par gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and as long as they abide in the Dharma, in accordance with the Dharma, and in the practice of the Dharma, the vital essence of the earth, the splendor of beings, and the splendor of the Dharma will not disappear from this world for a long time.🔽As long as they delight the world of gods, nāgas, yakṣas, and humans for a long time, beings will be reborn among the most powerful gods and humans after their deaths.

original: ji srid du yun ring por lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang mi'i 'jig rten na mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de srid du yun ring por sems can rnams tshe'i dus byas nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang🔽che bar grags pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji srid du yun ring por lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang mi'i 'jig rten na mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de srid du yun ring por sems can rnams tshe'i dus byas nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur /
translated: As long as they delight the world of gods and humans for a long time, beings will be reborn among the most powerful gods and humans after their deaths.

original: de srid du yun ring por lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de srid du yun ring por lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur /
translated: As long as they delight the world of gods and humans for a long time, beings will be reborn among the most powerful gods and humans after their deaths.

original: de srid du yun ring por chos la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: de srid du yun ring por chos la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas par 'gyur /
translated: For as long as the bodhisattvas remain in the Dharma for a long time,

original: de srid du 'di ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag cag stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pas gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: de srid du 'di ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag cag stobs dang brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pas gnas par 'gyur /
translated: for that long we will remain with strength, perseverance, and courage in order to destroy the forces of non-Dharma.

original: de srid du yun ring por bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lam dad pa'i sems can rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir nus par 'gyur /
analyzed: de srid du yun ring por bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lam dad pa'i sems can rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir nus par 'gyur /
translated: For that long, for a long time, we will be able to inspire faith in beings who have faith in the teachings of the Blessed One.

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas /
translated: Venerable Blessed One, in the future, because the Blessed One’s hearers will be holders of the Dharma,

original: rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang / @57b chos la gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang / nags khrod na gnas pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas ma la spong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang / @57b chos la gnas pa dang / dgon pa dang / nags khrod na gnas pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas ma la spong bar 'gyur /
translated: they will engage in yogic practice, abide by the Dharma, live in the wilderness and forests, and dwell in remote places.

original: phrag dog gi ngang tshul can dang bsags pa mang bas gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: phrag dog gi ngang tshul can dang bsags pa mang bas gnas par 'gyur /
translated: They will be jealous and accumulate much.

original: bslab pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bslab pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spong bar 'gyur /
translated: They will abandon the trainings, a sense of shame, and a sense of decency.

original: khyim na gnas pa dang 'dre ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' bar 'gyur /
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa dang 'dre ba dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' bar 'gyur /
translated: They will delight in living in households, in socializing, and in acquiring gain and honor.

original: de dag khyim pa'i stobs dang nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyis phan tshun 'dzoms par byed /
analyzed: de dag khyim pa'i stobs dang nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyis phan tshun 'dzoms par byed /
translated: They will gather together through the power of the householder’s wealth and the power of the householder’s possessions.

original: 'thab pa la dga' zhing khyim pa'i mdun du rtsod par byed /
analyzed: 'thab pa la dga' zhing khyim pa'i mdun du rtsod par byed /
translated: They will delight in quarreling and will dispute in the presence of householders.

original: brdzun dang tshig rtsub mo smra ba mi srung bas /
analyzed: brdzun dang tshig rtsub mo smra ba mi srung bas /
translated: They will not guard against lying and harsh speech.

original: khyim pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: khyim pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed par mi 'gyur /
translated: Householders will not develop faith in the Blessed One’s teaching of the Great Vehicle.🔽The faith of the kṣatriyas, brahmins, townspeople, and country dwellers in the Blessed One’s teaching will be cut off.”

original: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
translated: And the same sūtra says:

original: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
analyzed: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
translated: “In the present and future times,

original: rgyal rigs khyed cag thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab pa khrims su bca' ba gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs khyed cag thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab pa khrims su bca' ba gtad par bya'o //
translated: I entrust to the hands of you all of the warrior class the precepts of the śrāvakas to be established as law.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la gang zag lam ngan pa gdul dka' ba ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa spyod pa legs par ma byas pa rnams gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la gang zag lam ngan pa gdul dka' ba ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa spyod pa legs par ma byas pa rnams gnas par 'gyur /
translated: In the present and future times, there will be individuals in my teachings who are difficult to tame, who are shameless and have no sense of decency, and who do not act well.

original: gang dag gnyen bshes kyi stobs sam khyim pa'i stobs sam /
analyzed: gang dag gnyen bshes kyi stobs sam khyim pa'i stobs sam /
translated: They will be those who, by the power of their relatives, the power of their household,

original: mang du thos pa'i stobs sam /
analyzed: mang du thos pa'i stobs sam /
translated: the power of their learning,

original: 'khor gyi stobs kyis bslab pa dag la smas par spyod cing /
analyzed: 'khor gyi stobs kyis bslab pa dag la smas par spyod cing /
translated: or the power of their retinue, will act in violation of the precepts.

original: khyim pa'i rtags dang khyim pa'i longs spyod dang la lta bar byed /
analyzed: khyim pa'i rtags dang khyim pa'i longs spyod dang la lta bar byed /
translated: They will take on the signs of householders and the enjoyments of householders.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa yang len par byed /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa yang len par byed /
translated: They will take up what is to be held.

original: dge slong nyung bar gnas pa rnams kyis myur bar dge 'dun gyi nang nas dbyung ba dang / ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcad par mi nus pa de'i phyir bslab pa bca' ba'i bya ba rgyal rigs rnams kyi lag tu gtad par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong nyung bar gnas pa rnams kyis myur bar dge 'dun gyi nang nas dbyung ba dang / ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcad par mi nus pa de'i phyir bslab pa bca' ba'i bya ba rgyal rigs rnams kyi lag tu gtad par bya'o //
translated: Because the monks are few in number, they are unable to quickly expel from the community and impose the penalty of excommunication in accordance with the rule. Therefore, the task of promulgating the rules is entrusted to the hands of the warrior class.

original: rgyal rigs de dag de lta bu'i ngo bo'i gang zag rnams la ji ltar bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcod du 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: rgyal rigs de dag de lta bu'i ngo bo'i gang zag rnams la ji ltar bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcod du 'jug par byed do //
translated: Those warriors cause those persons of that kind to be punished in accordance with the rule.🔽Those warriors who are thus diligent and persevering in the present and future, up to the last five hundred years, protect my teaching.🔽They guard it.🔽They cause the way of the Dharma to blaze forth.🔽Those warriors are engaged in not cutting off the lineage of the Three Jewels.🔽Those warriors who are thus diligent and persevering in the present and future, up to the last five hundred years, protect my teaching.🔽They guard it.🔽They cause the way of the Dharma to blaze forth.🔽Those warriors are engaged in not cutting off the lineage of the Three Jewels.

original: rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar du de ltar brtson pa dang pha rol gnon pas nga'i bstan pa srung bar byed /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i mi rigs lags so //

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: de la ni kho na gyi bsam pa ma mchis te /

analyzed: de ltar bgyis na bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur lags so //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du /

analyzed: rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do //

analyzed: de nas rgyal po dang / blon po dang / dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g-yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na /

analyzed: ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya'am /

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te /

analyzed: de dag nyid kyi yon tan dang spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod bzhin du tshar gcod par bas so //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: gang dag de ltar sgom pa de dag gis ni bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar byas nas sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin sgom pa bsgom par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te /

analyzed: des na byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring ba dang / mchog tu tshe ring ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //

original: 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa /
analyzed: 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa /

original: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na /

analyzed: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid sku tshe thung lags ci slu ba mdzad dam /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu brtan pa'o //

analyzed: 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa /
translated: Mahākāśyapa of the same clan said:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said:

analyzed: bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du /

analyzed: 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa lha yul dang sa'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung yod do cog thams cad ni /
translated: All the rivers of life in the heavens and on earth

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab pa ste /
translated: flow into the ocean of the Tathagata's life.🔽Thus the Tathagata is supreme in longevity.

original: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /
analyzed: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo zhes gsungs pa dang / yang mdo de nyid las /

analyzed: rdo rje lta bur mi shigs pa'i sku 'di ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur lags /
translated: How is this vajra-like body attained?

analyzed: sku 'di lta bu rgyu cis 'grub lags /
translated: By what cause is such a body attained?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha replied:
